QuestData.Title: Ze Gnomecorder
QuestData.Description: Zese goblinz dizgust me. Zer filzy goblin technology iz inferior to anyzing gnomish, yet...$B$B<Professor Xakxak sighs.>$B$BIt iz ze last piece of ze puzzle! Wizout ze filzy goblin technology ze gnomecorder cannot be built!$B$BVenture eazt into ze "Skunkworks" and take from zem zer filzy goblin junk! You vill most likely find zem on goblin technicians.$B$B<Professor Xakxak laughs mockingly.>$B$BGoblin technician? Vut iz zat anyvay?$B$B<Professor Xakxak shrugs.>$B$BZome kind of oxymoron?
QuestData.LogDescription: Recover 8 pieces of Filthy Goblin Technology.
QuestData.CompletionText: Ze junk? Do you have zit?
QuestData.RewardText: Ah, ze junk haz arrived! Zit is ze last piece of ze puzzle! Now to zet it up! Standby, $n!
